entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Norway House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
